title: specification of pinpaths through an ic

numberOfPinPaths.description: number of pinPaths defined. This number should not be higher than the number of components included in the part

partPinPaths.description: list of pins associated with each component in a multi-component part
partPinPaths.example: for a dual FET part with components FET1 and FET2: list of pins associated with FET1 and list of pins associated with FET2

componentName.description: name of a component within a part

componentPinNames.description: names of pins associated with each of the component in the part. Pin names must match the name used in part pin definition
